price: 101. Zeg: “Zie, wat er in de hemelen en op aarde is,” maar noch tekenen noch waarschuwers zijn degenen die niet geloven tot nut.
arabic: قُلِ ٱنظُرُواْ مَاذَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِي ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: quli unẓurū mādhā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā tugh'nī al-āyātu wal-nudhuru ʿan qawmin lā yu'minūna
